column4: Has anyone had experience moving from Gnome to XFCE desktop? Im interested in copying my startmenu over ?
what did you use to copy the info over so i dont have to hand build the menu items
Configuring your menu in xfce (xubuntu) menus is a bit different than gnome's
is there a way to convert my items from gnome to xfce for the start menu?
You don't have a separate Places and System menu. Inother words, System is a submenu of applictions.
do you plan to install xubuntu?
no i had ubuntu and wanted to experience the xfce as its lighter on mem
Or do you want xfce on top of your ubuntu installation?
Ive already installed xfce on top of ubuntu im in it now
I need to get my menu items over from gnome menu
I'm afraid your menus will have to edited pretty much by hand. How is your xfce menu now? Is it OK?
just empty right now ive got a ton of programs to put on it
Oh, I see. Do you have a ~./config/xfce4/desktop/menu file ( i think that is the correct path)?
i found what i need thanks
Here's a script i used. It might help you: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=620215
